articles.title: Fencing: Catantan bows out in semis, fails to clinch Tokyo berth - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: Filipina fencer Samantha Catantan fell short of securing a spot in the Tokyo Olympics at the Asia-Oceania qualifiers held in Tashkent, Uzbekistan.
articles.content:
MANILA, Philippines -- Filipina fencer Samantha Catantan fell short of securing a spot in the Tokyo Olympics at the Asia-Oceania qualifiers held in Tashkent, Uzbekistan on Sunday.

articles.title: Singaporean fencer Amita Berthier earns Olympic spot after winning qualification tournament - CNA
articles.description: SINGAPORE: Amita Berthier has booked her place at this year's Olympic Games, after winning the women's foil event at the Asia-Oceanian Olympic Qualification Tournament in Tashkent, Uzbekistan on Sunday (Apr 25).
